name: shooty.io (pre-alpha)
description:
this is a eguo_studios.io pre-alpha game. this means that the play button doesn't work.

however feel free to press buttons! if you want to add ideas like the all eguo games have, then go in the game and click the "ideas" and share your ideas!

note!

don't give us hate because we haven't finished game

see the game in action while its being made! just go to yt:kevin erdmann-hermans
